channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: State police recruitâ€™s death in Massachusetts overshadows graduation ceremony
item.description: Friends and family of a state police recruit who died during training protested outside their graduation ceremony, demand to know how he died.

item.title: Alabama jailers to plead guilty for failing to help an inmate who froze to death
item.description: Two former corrections officers in Alabama have agreed to plead guilty to criminal charges in the death of a mentally ill inmate.

item.title: In remote mountain communities cut off by Helene, communities look to the skies for aid
item.description: National Guard members who deployed to western North Carolina are still carrying out aid missions nearly two weeks after Hurricane Helene.
